titles.title: A resolution congratulating the University of North Carolina Tar Heels basketball team for winning the 2008-2009 NCAA men's basketball championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/22/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the University of North Carolina for winning the 2008-2009 National Collegiate Athletic Association men's basketball national championship.
